channel.title: SAM Testing Site
channel.description: Updates and changes to my website, SAMTS

item.title: Website Redesign - Mobile Friendly + New Favicon
item.description: SamTS just got a little more mobile friendly and a lot better looking with this new total web redesign. Plus, light theme now carries over between pages and a cool new favicon has arrived.

item.title: Quoridor - A Strategy Game for 2 or 4 Players
item.description: Today I released a new game available to play on my website: Quoridor. Quoridor is a simple turn-based strategy game involving 2 or 4 players, a 9x9 board, and 20 walls. Check it out!
